channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Starbox
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Starbox

item.title: CVE-2024-8239|2024-09-30T06:00:06.516Z -- unknown -- starbox
item.description: The Starbox WordPress plugin before 3.5.3 does not properly render social media profiles URLs in certain contexts, like the malicious user's profile or pages where the starbox shortcode is used, which may be abused by users with at least the contributor role to conduct Stored XSS attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-7955|2024-09-10T06:00:02.205Z -- unknown -- starbox
item.description: The Starbox WordPress plugin before 3.5.2 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).

item.title: CVE-2024-7955|2024-09-10T15:04:36.519Z -- unknown -- starbox
item.description: The Starbox WordPress plugin before 3.5.2 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
